news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: A Jaipur-based energy start-up, identified as Cancrie, has initiated the production of nanomaterials from agricultural wastes. These materials are designed for use in energy storage devices like batteries and capacitors, aiming to enhance their energy efficiency.

overview_description.description: Cancrie produces sustainable advanced material for energy storage devices. It transforms waste into quality advanced battery material that increases the efficiency of energy storage devices through a simple drop-in solution.

about_short_description.short_description: Cancrie produces sustainable advanced material for energy storage devices.

product.name: Cancrie Carbon
product.description: A patented carbon material designed for use in various battery chemistries and supercapacitors, enhancing performance through high surface area, porosity, and conductivity.

product.name: Nanocarbon from Organic Waste
product.description: Transforms organic waste into nanocarbons for use in batteries and capacitors, aiming for sustainability and efficiency in energy storage.

product.name: Lead-Acid Battery Enhancement
product.description: Incorporates Cancrie's carbon into lead-acid batteries to improve surface area and cohesion, resulting in higher efficiency and extended lifecycle.
